description:
***New in 2.0: Now easyClock supports Exhibition Mode!

Try to find a convenient time for your conference call with people spread around the globe? 
Keep in touch with family and friends in several time zones?

easyClock make your life easier! easyClock is an  simple and elegant world clock. It's never been so easy to do time conversion: simply tap the left and right arrow buttons. 

Features: 
- New in 2.0: Supports Exhibition Mode!
- Time zone information of 650+ cities across the world 
- Deal with daylight saving time for you 
- Tap the arrow buttons to switch time and see what's the time in various time zones
- Press the arrow buttons and hold to switch time fast
- Drag and drop to reorder cities
- Swipe to delete city

For feedback & suggestions please feel free to contact on twitter: @jeffyuanjeff or email: jeffyuanjeff@gmail.com.
